channel.title: [HELP] Adding NPC's, Shops, Commands and Emotes [HELP]
channel.description:
Hello, My Name is Ang3l Scap3, but you can call me Sean. I am in the process of Learning Java coding. So I have a Few Questions about where I would place a few codes.
Q1:- I am wanting to place this code [See below] as a General Store at Edgeville at the POS [X: 3091, Y: 3482] But As you can see that Under the Code Below, The Picture, that there is a Object there along with coffins . . . How do I delete this object and the ones hilighted in gray and add shops.
[code]shop = 1 General Store 200 1000 201 2000 202 3000 203 4000 305 5000[/code]
[IMG]http://i405.photobucket.com/albums/pp137/Sargent0993/Layout1.jpg[/img]
Q2:- Where would I ensert a command like the one below.
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home")) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3492; }[/code]
Q2:- Sucesfully answered by my Friend Daved.
Q3:- How do I Add Emotes to my Server, because as you can see below there isn't any coded, along with PVP items and GS stances.
[IMG]http://i405.photobucket.com/albums/pp137/Sargent0993/Untitled-13.jpg[/img]
Q4:- How do I make a Command like ::item 11694 1, basically a pickup item for Admins+, and then how do I make it so Admins+ Can Not Trade.
If I have anymore Questions I will post here . . . I am coding from a Blank Client and Source.
-- Ang3l Scap3

item.title: [HELP] Adding NPC's, Shops, Commands and Emotes [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Ang3l_Scap3 Ang3l Scap3
item.description:
@Ang3l_Scap3 wrote:

Q1:- We have the Shops working now, but the only way to see the items is to Talk to Herquin, not Trade him . . . If you trade him there not there. Help?

Q2:- Answer, but I want to find a ::empty command and a spawning command like ::item 11694 1 . . .

Q3:- Un - Answered still :’(.

Q4:- How do I add items like Skill Capes to the server, because when you get 99 and it spawns the cape into your inv the cape appears as a Null.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adding NPC's, Shops, Commands and Emotes [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Ang3l Scap3, post:10, topic:316705”]I got it to work now . . . I got ::home to work, but it just goes straight to it . . . How do I make it do the teleport emote.

And How do I erase those objects still . . .[/quote]There should be a Delete object method somewhere in your server.

And addEmote(Tele emote id);

I think? I don’t code anymore :\

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adding NPC's, Shops, Commands and Emotes [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

In client.java search for

public static void customCommand(client c) {

a few lines under that add this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home")) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3492; }

All I cba to help with.

item.title: [HELP] Adding NPC's, Shops, Commands and Emotes [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Ang3l_Scap3 Ang3l Scap3
item.description:
@Ang3l_Scap3 wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:2, topic:316705”]question one: search for deletethat in client.java follow the format there.

question two: I advise you make the command like this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home")) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3492; } add it with all your other commands. search for “customcommand” in client.java

question 3: search for- case 153: or case 168: and add

[code] case 168:
setAnimation(827);

            break;[/code] that should perform a random emote.( i don't know which)[/quote]

Q1:- “deletethat” can not be found in client.java
Q2:- “customcommand” can not be found in client.java
Q3:- I do not understand what you are trying to say.

I am using a blank source and client which can be found here.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adding NPC's, Shops, Commands and Emotes [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

question one: search for deletethat in client.java follow the format there.

question two: I advise you make the command like this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home")) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3492; } add it with all your other commands. search for “customcommand” in client.java

question 3: search for- case 153: or case 168: and add

[code] case 168:
setAnimation(827);

            break;[/code] that should perform a random emote.( i don't know which)

Hello,
My Name is Ang3l Scap3, but you can call me Sean. I am in the process of Learning Java coding. So I have a Few Questions about where I would place a few codes.

Q1:- I am wanting to place this code [See below] as a General Store at Edgeville at the POS [X: 3091, Y: 3482] But As you can see that Under the Code Below, The Picture, that there is a Object there along with coffins . . . How do I delete this object and the ones hilighted in gray and add shops.

shop = 1	General Store		200	1000	201	2000	202	3000	203	4000	305	5000

Q2:- Where would I ensert a command like the one below.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Home")) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3492; }

Q2:- Sucesfully answered by my Friend Daved.

Q3:- How do I Add Emotes to my Server, because as you can see below there isn’t any coded, along with PVP items and GS stances.

Q4:- How do I make a Command like ::item 11694 1, basically a pickup item for Admins+, and then how do I make it so Admins+ Can Not Trade.

If I have anymore Questions I will post here . . . I am coding from a Blank Client and Source.

– Ang3l Scap3
